entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this morning. Rain beginning late this afternoon. Snow level rising to 900 metres this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023
